content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
We came on a late Friday night and were seated immediately, which was a plus.Good food and environment - pretty much what you would expect from a Korean pub in Ktown. Food came out quick and the servers were responsive enough.Cup noodle fried rice was surprisingly delicious but the kimchi cream pasta and rose tteokboki tasted pretty much the same (I would recommend getting one or the other).
